Text:
Forgot to say that I only have 100k upload speed so bare with me... you will all eventually finish your download.
If you finish it please stay in seed for the others.
Thanks
what is the quality of these and wjere are all the other seasons? kinda like to watch em all in order like i did with dallas. thanks

@bryentheartist: If you search TPB for Dynasty Season you will see that Seasons 1-6 are available.
The quality of this is pretty decent as it is a HDTV Rip from the channel SOAP.

At 10 pm GMT+1 or 4 pm NY time I have to shut down my PC for a couple of hours. We have a major thunderstorm coming our way and we can see the lightening and hear the thunder already.
Sorry for the inconvenience, but I hope you'll excuse me. Will be back online as soon as the toughest is past.
It's 00:12 and I'm back online... thanks for bearing with me but the storm even knocked out TV

Tomorrow morning when I get up... around 8:30 am (GMT+1) I will stop seeding this file.
I don't care if you have finished the file and hope to see a lot of comments bitching and complaining.
There are over 30 people that finished the file and as you can see a lot decided to Hit'n Run.
Sorry for the others but I have other sites where I am a uploader and thought I'd do a lot of people a favour by uploading this here.
Not 1 thank you comment, not 1 quality comment, so tough luck on all of you folks.

Thanks Tallyortoby, NICE work !!
And I fully understand your irritation with peoples whom dl&run - its a plague man! if I had left all my torrents at some point because of that, 98% of them would be dead. Pity truth. I'll seed because I LIKE sharing good stuff with people. Please come back sometime (like every 6 months) - I bet there will be bunch of people w8ing for you and being VERY grateful that U're back - who knows, may be they even will seed for a long time :)
And now my personal record - my share ration for one of my torrents (Bodyguard) was over 500 and I still was alone seeding it, lol !! There are decent people out there - they may just not find your upload yet !!
Be Safe !
